p: Dagnet et al. [50] report that Walmart’s SBT for scope 3 made Pakistani supplier Yunus Textile Mills commit to setting its own SBT, as also reported in a 2017 blogpost by SBTi [77]. However, Yunus Textile Mills appear to have not developed a target, as it was not in SBTi’s target database, as of 14 December 2021 [37].
